item.description:
Hello everyone! I am trying to start a dining out meetup in the Rhode Island area. I love the idea of the Boston one, but it's always too far to drive it seems and it is hard to reserve because the group is so large.

The first one will be at Cassarino's on Federal Hill. I chose this location as it is one of my favorite restaurants on Federal Hill and I thought it would be a nice place to start the group. The food is great and the prices are pretty reasonable for what they offer(and their lemon drop martini is AWESOME).

Cassarino's said a party of 18 now can be easily arranged. However, they will only do a maximum of 4 bills so four-five people will be on each bill(so please plan on paying accordingly). I will try and make this as seamless as possible for everyone, but I hope everyone understands and is patient.

Oh my! We are full already. If you are still interested in attending, please enter a "no" response and put a note stating that you want to be wait-listed.

Everyone who comes, please plan on bringing a dollar to help me defray the cost of posting on meetup. That would be such a big help to me!

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: The Rhode Island Dining Out November Meetup- CASSARINO's
